titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of imported chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/25/1995--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs Service, upon proper request, to: (1) reliquidate certain entries of imported chemicals (Perkadox 16 and all its variations) at a rate of duty of 3.7 percent ad valorem; and (2) refund to the importer any excess duties paid with respect to such entries.
